summary: Comprehensive testing of Technician and Customer Portal features completed successfully. All requested features are working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Technician and Customer Portal features are working. The app has three login portals (Admin, Technician, Customer). Technician portal requires selecting a technician from dropdown before viewing Calendar/Services.

status_filter.notes: Status/Condition filter with options: All Conditions, Reported, Registered, In Progress, Resolved - filters issues correctly

city_filter.notes: City filter with options: All Cities, Vilnius, Kaunas, Klaipėda, Šiauliai, Panevėžys

three_dates_display.notes: Resolved issues display all 3 dates: Reported (created_at), Registered (technician_assigned_at), Resolved (resolved_at)

sorting.notes: Issues sorted by latest date on top (descending order)

calendar_mark_in_progress.notes: Calendar shows 'Start Work' button for scheduled open issues. Clicking updates issue status to 'in_progress' and shows 'Working...' badge

services_page_in_progress.notes: Services page shows 'In Progress Issues' section with count. Issues marked as in_progress from Calendar appear here

resolve_issue.notes: Resolve Issue dialog has: Service Type (Warranty/Non-Warranty), Resolution Note. Non-Warranty shows additional fields: Estimated Fix Time (hours), Estimated Cost (Eur), and checkbox to auto-create Service Record
